definition: cupping glass/fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
to pull up/to pull out/to draw out by suction/to select/to pick/to stand out (above level)/to surpass/to seize
fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)

sentences.english: Master the manipulation of flash-fire cupping therapy.
sentences.chinese: 掌握闪火法拔罐的操作。

sentences.english: I decided it was time to tick the cupping box on my list.
sentences.chinese: 我决定是时候滴答作响拔罐框我的名单上。

sentences.english: "Think of cupping as the anti-science version, " wrote Carter.
sentences.chinese: “就把拔罐当成一种反科学的形式吧，”卡特写道。

sentences.english: It has the same therapy effects as the cupping with open fire.
sentences.chinese: 与明火拔罐具有同样治疗效果。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of Zhuang medicine Bazhuguan for arthralgia-syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察壮医药物竹筒拔罐治疗痹病的疗效。

sentences.english: Cupping refers to the use of cup-shaped instruments to apply suction to the area being needled.
sentences.chinese: 拔罐是指使用杯形仪器适用于该地区的吸被针刺。

sentences.english: Its form mimics the cupping of a palm, which is inviting to the hand.
sentences.chinese: 它的形式模仿拔罐的棕榈，这是邀请来的手。

sentences.english: Therefore, many diseases can be use cupping therapy for treatment.
sentences.chinese: 所以，许多疾病都可以采用拔罐疗法进行治疗。

definition: suction cup (used in Chinese medicine to draw the blood and qi 氣|气)/detachable suction chimney to make a stove draw
acupuncture and moxibustion/to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion
tui na (form of Chinese manual therapy)
fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
diathermia (medical treatment involving local heating of body tissues with electric current)
folk remedy involving repeatedly pinching the neck, throat, back etc to increase blood flow to the area and relieve inflammation
